markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />command, envision ([aura](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=5)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You call forth a storm of leaves from _autumn's embrace_. These leaves swirl in a 20-foot emanation for 1 minute. Creatures within the area are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), and creatures outside the area are concealed to creatures within the leaves. However, you can see through this concealment. You can Dismiss the activation.
name: command, envision (aura)

text: Activate Two Actionscommand, envision (aura) Frequency once per day; Effect You call forth a storm of leaves from autumn's embrace . These leaves swirl in a 20-foot emanation for 1 minute. Creatures within the area are concealed, and creatures outside the area are concealed to creatures within the leaves. However, you can see through this concealment. You can Dismiss the activation.
